snippet: As scientists try to reconcile the discovery of the Higgs boson with what they thought they knew, one theory suggests that a glitch in the Higgs field could end the universe as we know it.
abstract: Dennis Overbye Out There column notes theory that Higgs field, invisible ocean of energy that permeates space, may contain glitch that could end universe as we know it; scenario is one of many possibilities emerging as physicists try to reconcile discovery of Higgs bosun particle with what has long been theorized about cosmos.
lead_paragraph: As scientists try to reconcile the discovery of the Higgs boson with what they thought they knew, one theory suggests that a glitch in the Higgs field could end the universe as we know it.

headline.print_headline: Finding Higgs Merely Opens More Puzzles
headline.main: Finding the Higgs Leads to More Puzzles
